translat write system a critic review of recent effort toautom the write of translat of program languag is presentthe formal studi of syntax and it applic to translatwrite ar discuss in section ii variou approach to automthe post syntact semant aspect of translat write ar discussin section iii and sever relat topic in section ivcacm februari 1968 feldman j gri d compil compil compiltranslat
